mapper.sql: prdt_no, prdt_optn_no, stock_qty, order_count, rgster_no, rgst_dtm, moder_no, mod_dtm
mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.product.repository.master.PdProductOptionStockSabangnetDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE PD_PRODUCT_OPTION_STOCK_SABANGNET
prdt_no = #{prdtNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prdt_optn_no = #{prdtOptnNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_qty = #{stockQty, jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_count = #{orderCount, jdbcType=INTEGER},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moder_no = #{moderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_dtm = #{modDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE prdt_no = #{prdtNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND prdt_optn_no = #{prdtOptnNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
